summary: Defines distributed array types for timestamps and time intervals, storing values as 64‑bit nanoseconds and offering indexing, arithmetic, rounding, statistical reductions, and seamless conversion to pandas datetime structures. Includes utilities for creating date and timedelta ranges.
business_intent: Enable large‑scale, server‑side time‑series analysis in Arkouda by providing pandas‑compatible temporal array operations that can be executed across a distributed cluster.
